name: Skate or Don't! (itch)
description:
Skate or Don't! is a massively multiplayer online arcade game.

Features:

Over 1000 players

64 colors

Works with gamepad or keyboard

D-pad (Arrow keys): crouch, lean left or right A button (Z or Space): jump (must be crouched to jump) X button (Shift): kick (accelerate), push off of handplant

Tips and tricks:

when in doubt, hold down don't jump on ramps if you're stuck on your side, hold down and press X to flip back up press down just before touching the ground for a softer landing to do a backflip, lean left on the ramp, then hold down to speed up rotation as needed
